MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA6 postcode area of Frodsham affecting properties in Waterside Drive, Pennington Close and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 8:49am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:34am on 2nd March 2021
